scene.name: intro
scene.line: Two figures crouch over a pile of wood a few yards from the creek, occasionally hammering or making adjustments.

option.insertedText: Junebug pulls the bike closer to the creek.
Junebug stays on the highway, following the truck.

scene.name: approach
scene.line: What looked from the road like a haphazard pile of wood is actually a worn boat. It's in poor repair. Perhaps it was abandoned, and only recently salvaged.

option.insertedText: Johnny sits on a nearby rock.

scene.name: greeting
scene.line: There is too much work to be done. Rotten planks need to be pulled and replaced. Nails need to be driven. Gaps caulked.

option.insertedText: Johnny switches on the field recorder.
Johnny sits on a nearby rock.

scene.name: rock
scene.line: The creek is low this time of year, and the rock is only a little wet from condensation. He weighs the field recorder in his hand, listens to bending boards and hammering.

option.insertedText: Johnny switches on the field recorder.

scene.name: record
scene.line: The recorder's red light flips on with a thrum, the take-up reel rolls forward silently for a moment before catching tape and beginning the recording.

scene.name: stop-working
scene.line: One of the figures stops working, sets down a caulk gun, and looks over at Johnny. The other finishes tearing at a bit of rotten wood stuck to the hull, then turns.
After a minute or two, Johnny stops the recorder. File that one under "water sounds."
